sentences.en: a design fault
sentences.cn: 设计失误

sentences.en: admitted to being at fault.
sentences.cn: 承认有罪

sentences.en: All her fault, the wicked little so-and-so.
sentences.cn: 都是她的错，这个小坏东西。

sentences.en: Divorce is never the fault of one partner; it takes two.
sentences.cn: 离婚从来都不是一方的错误：双方都有责任。

sentences.en: Don't you go thinking it was your fault.
sentences.cn: 别觉得是你的错。

sentences.en: For all his faults (= in spite of his faults ) he was a good father.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有缺点，但还是个好父亲。

sentences.en: found fault with his speech.
sentences.cn: 挑他演讲的错

sentences.en: generous to a fault.
sentences.cn: 过度慷慨

sentences.en: He could never accept that he had been at fault.
sentences.cn: 他怎么也无法承认是他的错。

sentences.en: His worst fault is his arrogance.
sentences.cn: 他最大的缺点是傲慢。

sentences.en: His worst fault was his inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 他最大的缺点就是反复无常。

sentences.en: I didn’t sleep well that night, but it was my own fault .
sentences.cn: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

sentences.en: I may have my faults , but ingratitude is not one of them.
sentences.cn: 我可能有我的缺点，但我决不会忘恩负义。

sentences.en: I was disappointed whenever the cook found fault with my work.
sentences.cn: 每当厨师挑剔我干的活儿时，我都非常沮丧。

sentences.en: I’m really sorry - it’s all my fault.
sentences.cn: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.en: It is hard to fault the way he runs his own operation.
sentences.cn: 他经营自己公司的方式无可指摘。

sentences.en: It sounds as if there’s a fault in one of the loudspeakers.
sentences.cn: 听起来好像其中一个扩音器有毛病。

sentences.en: It wasn't her fault, she was trying her best to help.
sentences.cn: 这不是她的错，她是尽力帮忙的。

sentences.en: It's an open and shut case. The hospital is at fault.
sentences.cn: 这件事一目了然，责任在医院一方。

sentences.en: Oh, the whole episode was entirely his fault.
sentences.cn: 天啊，整件事完全是他的错。

sentences.en: Still, he reflected charitably, it was hardly her fault.
sentences.cn: 不过，他体谅地想，这不能算是她的错。

sentences.en: The aircraft made an unscheduled landing after developing an electrical fault.
sentences.cn: 飞机由于发生电力故障而作了临时降落。

sentences.en: the San Andreas fault
sentences.cn: 圣安德烈亚斯断层

sentences.en: These issues have created a stark fault line within the Peace Process.
sentences.cn: 这些问题显然已成为了和平进程中的薄弱环节。

sentences.en: They feel shame and guilt as though it is their fault.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得羞愧和内疚，就好像这是他们的错。

sentences.en: You can't fault them for lack of invention.
sentences.cn: 你不能因为他们缺乏创新就指责他们。

sentences.en: you're kind, caring and generous to a fault.
sentences.cn: 你宽厚、体贴、大方得过分了。

words.tran_cn: [地质] 断层作用；断层错动；故障
（通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔

phrases.tran_cn: （过分表现出某好品质的人）过分，过度
断块；故障闭塞；断裂地块
挑错，找错：寻找、发现和抱怨错处；批评

trans.tran_cn: 责任，错误，缺点，（地壳）断层，发球失误
trans.tran_en: a bad or weak part of someone’s character
to criticize someone or something for a mistake

trans.tran_cn: 找…的缺点， 挑剔， 指责
trans.tran_en: to criticize someone or something for a mistake
